name: Olay Body Wash for Women, Ultra Moisture, 24hr Moisturizing, Hydrating & Refreshing, B3 Vitamin Complex, Free of Parabens & Phthalates, For All Skin Types, Shea Butter Scent, 22 fl oz
short_description: INDULGE DAILY: Visibly transform your skin in just 2 weeks with our Ultra Moisture Body Wash with Shea Butter, leaving skin feeling smooth & looking healthy
CLINICALLY PROVEN: In a clinical study, experts noticed dry skin improvement in 95% of women
OLAY EXPERTISE: Backed by 60 years of skin science
"B" IS FOR BEAUTIFUL: Now Olay's proprietary skin care formula, made with Vitamin B3 Complex, helps to transform your skin
product_description: BEAUTIFUL, HEALTHY SKIN YOU CAN SEE AND FEEL - Reveal beautiful, healthy-looking skin with Olay Ultra Moisture Body Wash with Shea Butter. Now formulated with Olay’s Vitamin B3 Complex, it hydrates to plump surface skin cells, locking in natural moisture. Our advanced formula, with Shea Butter and Olay moisturizers, indulges skin to leave it spa-soft and touchably smooth.

name: Dove Body Wash Deep Moisture for 24hr Lotion-Soft Skin Moisture Moisturizing Skin Cleanser with No Sulfates No Parabens 30.6 oz
short_description: Allure Best of Beauty winning product 2023, 2024, 2025. SMOOTHER SKIN IN JUST ONE WASH: Our long-lasting moisturizing body wash formula, with millions of MicroMoisture droplets, leaves skin feeling seriously soft and nourished.
24HR RENEWING MICROMOISTURE: Get lotion-soft skin with Dove Deep Moisture Body Wash that gently cleans and deeply moisturizes, leaving skin nourished and healthy-looking for 24 hours.
PLANT-BASED MOISTURIZERS: Treat your microbiome (aka skin’s living protective layer) with naturally derived cleansers and skin-natural nutrients that gently nourish for seriously moisturized skin.
NOURISHES THE DRIEST SKIN: The ultimate thirst trap for dry skin with a formula that actively regenerates skin’s natural moisture for instant and all-day hydration.

THOUGHTFULLY MADE: Our body wash is vegan and Dove is PETA approved, meaning we do not test on animals anywhere in the world. Plus, it’s sulfate-free, paraben-free and packaged in 100% recycled bottles, so you can feel good about choosing Dove.
product_description: Product Description A body wash that gives you lotion-soft feeling skin? Yep, you read that right. Dove Deep Moisture Body Wash is a new type of body care that does what it says. It delivers such deep moisture that your skin will feel lotion-soft long after you leave the shower. Think of it as a shortcut to lotion-soft skin that takes no shortcuts on skin-loving, hydrating ingredients. Let’s get deep to explain. Millions of 24hr Renewing MicroMoisture droplets with skin-natural nourishers and plant-based moisturizers absorb deeply and work with your skin’s natural renewal process to help retain and boost moisture for nourished, soft and healthy-looking skin. You can count on them to deliver a deep level of moisture that starts in the shower and lasts all day. We’re talking peak moisturization. Like iconic level moisture. Up there with Dove's iconic scent of care with gentle, fresh flowers, nourishing soft vanilla, and creamy, milky musks. But don’t take our word for it, try it for yourself. To use this rich, creamy body wash, squeeze into palms or loofah, massage onto skin, rinse, and step out of the shower feeling moisturized all over. And take a minute to touch that incredibly soft skin. Who else would you trust, but the No.1 dermatologist-recommended brand (us) to deliver a long-lasting, nourishing body wash? Plus it’s sulfate-free, paraben-free and packaged in a 100% recyclable bottle. Our Deep Moisture Body Wash is PETA approved, meaning we do not test on animals anywhere in the world. Brand Story By Dove

name: Suave Moisturizing Body Wash, Cocoa Butter and Shea with Vitamin E Extract, No Parabens, No Phtahaltes, 18 Oz Pack of 6
short_description: Allow us to reintroduce ourselves! Suave Essentials Body Washes are now new and improved, featuring a new look, long-lasting fragrances, and 10x the moisturizers than before.
Indulge in the rich and decadent, long-lasting scent of whipped cocoa butter, luscious coconuts and warm vanilla.
Our creamy lather in our moisturizing body wash features a sweet blend oil essence and is bursting with bubbles, leaving your skin feeling instantly hydrated and silky smooth.
Now with 10x more moisturizers than before! This body wash and skin cleanser, with infused Vitamin E, will leave you feeling fresh and pampered long after you shower.
All Suave Essentials Body washes are formulated without parabens or phthalates. Suave is certified Cruelty Free by PETA. Globally, Suave does not test on animals.
Discover Suave Essentials Body Wash with fragrances as beautiful as Bath and Body Works. Whether you're looking for something fresh, sweet, floral, or fruity, we got you and your family covered!
product_description: Your skin deserves a treat! Indulge in the rich and decadent, long-lasting scent of whipped cocoa butter, luscious coconuts and warm vanilla. Our creamy lather features sweet blend oil essence and is bursting with bubbles, leaving your skin feeling instantly hydrated and silky smooth. Our Cocoa Butter & Shea body wash is infused with vitamin E, known to condition skin. This Suave Essentials shower gel can help leave your skin feeling soft and smooth, not dry. To use, wrap yourself in bubbly lather. Rinse. Feel your skin smile. This liquid body wash creates a rich, creamy lather that rinses clean for an enjoyable shower experience. Suave body washes and shower gels are perfect for everyday use and great for the whole family. Suave body wash and shower gel skincare products are made with fun, fresh scents that will help leave your skin feeling clean and soft, and smelling great. Whether you prefer beautiful floral blooms, fresh and fruity bursts or luxuriously creamy body washes, we’re sure you’ll love our fragrances. We invite you to try all of our delightfully crafted Suave Essentials body wash fragrances and let your senses decide on the best body wash for you. *Bath & Body Works is a registered trademark of Bath & Body Works Brand Management, Inc.

name: Olay Body Wash for Women, Age Defying with Vitamin E, 24hr Moisturizing, Hydrating & Refreshing, B3 Vitamin Complex, Free of Parabens & Phthalates, for All Skin Types, Scented, 22 fl oz (Pack of 2)
short_description: MOISTURIZING FORMULA: This body wash provides continuous hydration, ensuring your skin remains soft and supple throughout the day.
VITAMIN E & B3 COMPLEX: Formulated with Vitamin E and B3, this body wash visibly transform your skin in just 2 weeks, leaving skin feeling smooth & looking healthy.
AGE DEFYING BENEFITS: This body wash is formulated to help reduce the appearance of aging by promoting visibly smooth skin, in a clinical study, experts noticed dry skin improvement in 95% of women.
CLINICALLY PROVEN: In a clinical study, experts noticed dry skin improvement in 95% of women
IDEAL FOR DAILY USE: This body wash is perfect for everyday application, making it easy to incorporate into your skincare routine.
USE TOGETHER: Use with Olay Ultra Rich Moisture Hydrating Body Lotion to enhance effects moisturizing ingredients
product_description: Revitalize your skin with Olay Age Defying Body Wash, specially formulated to promote beautiful, healthy skin you can see and feel. This body wash is enriched with Vitamin E and a nourishing B3 Complex, providing deep hydration and anti-aging benefits. Each use of this body wash gently cleanses while moisturizing, leaving your skin feeling soft, supple, and youthful. This body wash transforms your shower into a rejuvenating experience, helping to lock in your skin’s natural moisture. Ideal for daily use, this body wash works to visibly transform your skin in just 2 weeks, making it a perfect addition to your skincare routine. Treat yourself to the age-defying benefits of Olay Age Defying Body Wash, a body wash that helps you maintain beautiful and healthy skin you can see and feel.

name: Native Moisturizing Body Wash Contains Naturally Derived Ingredients | For Women & Men, Sulfate, Paraben, & Dye Free Leaving Skin Soft and Hydrated | Shea Butter & Almond 18 oz
short_description: Clean Ingredients - Native body wash contains naturally derived ingredients. We also use both safe, synthetic, sustainable fragrances (free of phthalates) and natural fragrances.
Clean Scents - Our aromatic scents turn the routine task of showering or bathing into a memorable and luxurious experience. It's the little things in life.

Soft Skin Feeling - Lovingly made with cleansers derived from coconut oil to leave your skin feeling hydrated. Transporting you to your own private white sand beach, the Native Body Wash is both sweet and sophisticated.
Vegan & Cruelty Free - Our body wash is free of SLS, SLES & phthalates.
Shea Butter & Almond - Cocooning in a bed of cashmere on a cold winter day. A sweet blend of almond milk, vanilla, and honey notes. Rich and luxurious.
product_description: Say bye to dry skin with Native 24-Hour Moisturizing Body Wash. Infused with real shea butter, this luxurious body wash leaves your skin feeling soft, smooth, and hydrated all day long. Free of sulfates, parabens, petrolatum, and dyes, this body wash for men and women provides 7x more moisturization* compared to Native regular body wash. It's also thoughtfully made with 12 ingredients for a soothing cleanse that's great for all skin types. The rich, creamy suds help lock-in moisture, so your skin feels replenished after you rinse. Let the refreshing scent turn your shower into a happy escape. Singing while you wash is highly recommended. Native: Clean. Simple. Effective. Like all Native products, this 24-hour moisturizing body wash provides a delightful personal care experience. Complete your self-care routine with Native's full range of products including deodorant, hair care, and moisturizing lotion.

name: Dove Serum Body Wash Calming Moisture renews skin with Retinol Serum 18.5 Fl Oz
short_description: RENEWING: A nightly body wash to support cell turnover for renewed skin in the morning

MADE WITH ACTIVE SKIN CARE INGREDIENTS: Our advanced formula with a blend of active MicroMoisture plus retinol and botanical oils works with skin while you sleep to boost resilience for a strengthened and renewed moisture barrier
PROMOTES DEWY, SUPPLE SKIN: Transform your nightly shower routine into a relaxing body care ritual
CREAMY, SERUM WASH: This creamy body wash transforms into velvety foam, filling your shower with the calming aroma of warm oat milk
CLINICALLY PROVEN INGREDIENTS: Co-created with dermatologists and beauty expert
product_description: Wish you could wake up to renewed skin? Our advanced formula with a blend of active MicroMoisture + retinol and botanical oils works with skin while you sleep to boost This creamy body wash transforms into velvety foam, filling your shower with calming aroma of warm oat milk. Has your skin been missing out? New Dove Serum Shower Collection is infused with active skin care ingredients to supercharge your body care routine. Quench thirsty skin with hydrating serum + hyaluronic acid, help prevent acne with acne clearing salicylic acid treatment, or recharge skin’s glow with brightening serum + vitamin C. Dove teamed up with leading dermatologists and beauty experts to create a new shower collection that brings expert skin care into your shower. Infused with the ingredients you already love using on your face (hello, hyaluronic acid!), these body washes, scrubs and beauty bars care were created for your unique needs. Because we think beautiful, visibly healthy skin is a head-to-toe kind of thing. Dove is the Dermatologist recommended body wash brand.This cleanser is made with naturally derived gentle skin cleansers, no sulfates or parabens and is PETA-certified vegan.

name: NIVEA MEN Maximum Hydration Body Wash for Dry Skin, Aloe Vera Enriched, 3-in-1 Moisturizing Body Wash, Face and Hair, Paraben Free, Vegan Formula, 16.9 Fl Oz Bottle, Pack of 3
short_description: 3-IN-1 FORMULA: The 3-in-1 formula can be used as a moisturizing body wash, face wash and shampoo

LONG-LASTING HYDRATION: Hydrating body wash for men enriched with Aloe Vera and our maximum level of moisturizers (amongst NIVEA MEN Body Wash line) provides nourishing moisture and long-lasting hydration
MASCULINE SCENT: Men's body wash with citrusy notes and woody amber for a long-lasting modern, masculine fragrance
FORMULATED WITHOUT: Microplastic particles, parabens, phthalates and animal-derived ingredients
COMMITMENT TO SUSTAINABILITY: This vegan body wash for men is made using 92% naturally derived ingredients*, has a 99% biodegradable formula**, and comes in a bottle made from 96% recycled plastic***
BULK BODY WASH PACK INCLUDES: Three (3) 16.9 fluid ounce bottles of NIVEA MEN Maximum Hydration Body Wash with Aloe Vera
product_description: Product Description Experience long-lasting hydration right out of the shower with NIVEA MEN Maximum Hydration Body Wash. This mens body wash for dry skin is enriched with Aloe Vera and our maximum level of moisturizers (amongst NIVEA MEN Body Wash line) to refresh and cleanse the skin and leave it feeling hydrated and comfortable. The 3-in-1 shower gel can be used as a body wash, face wash and shampoo. With a long-lasting citrus and woody amber scent, this body cleanser creates a modern, masculine fragrance, leaving you feeling fresh long after the shower. Plus, it has a vegan formula (animal-derived ingredients) that is free from microplastic particles, parabens, phthalates and dyes. This paraben free body wash is formulated with 92% naturally derived ingredients* and a 99% biodegradable formula**, plus it's packaged in a bottle made from 96% recycled plastic***, reflecting NIVEA's commitment to sustainability. Complete your men's skin care routine by pairing it with the NIVEA MEN Maximum Hydration range. *Naturally derived ingredients, including purified water, have undergone processing while retaining a majority of their natural molecular structure. 8% skin safe synthetics are included to maintain the integrity of the formula. **as per OECD or equivalent methods ***excluding label From the Manufacturer Nivea men maximum hydration body wash with moisturizers & aloe vera extract effectively cleanses and provides skin with intense moisture even after towel drying.
